queries.filter-eq-2: SELECT age FROM emps WHERE deptno = 40
queries.filter-eq-3: SELECT age, gender FROM emps WHERE deptno = 40
queries.filter-eq-4: SELECT manager FROM emps WHERE deptno = 40
queries.filter-eq-5: SELECT slacker FROM emps WHERE deptno = 40
queries.filter-eq-10: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE age = 25 and deptno = 40
queries.filter-eq-11: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE age = 25 and deptno = 40 and empno = 100
queries.filter-eq-14: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE empno = empno
queries.filter-eq-15: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE empno = deptno
queries.filter-or-1: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE age = 80 or deptno = 20
queries.filter-or-2: SELECT * FROM emps WHERE age = 80 or deptno = 20 or empno = 100
